creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Hanging, large, yellow satin, with woven bands of flowers and symbols in red, green, blue, and white.  Vertical seam down center.  Green border with all-over brocaded design of pink, tan and red flowers and blue stems and leaves.  Light brown cotton lining.
title: Hanging
